commit_message: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/main'
Added scripts for postprocessing results.
dockerize genomel editor
Re #10 -- Improved font size for Volpiano-font volpiano input, so that it is not so small.
Re #10 -- Added the switch. Don't like that the textarea sizes change when the switch is done, so this is why I'm not closing the ticket yet.
UI improvements in styling: bigger fonts, sans-serif, annotation form in table, etc.
Closes #8: Empty melody now detected in save_annotation() view, imputed with empty string.
Editor Help now opens in new tab, so that it does not interfere with the annotation tab.

Closes #7: Overhauled Melody creation as a transaction with locking the chant objects so that they cannot be selected by a concurrent transaction.

Includes moving Melody saving into the database to when it is first initialized (in annotation_logic.py create_new_melody_from_chant() function).

Re #8: Adds initial default Volpiano. Users can of course delete this, but at least it avoids the issue when saving immediately upon getting assigned a new melody.
Added favicon.

Closes #4: Added annotator dashboard.

Closes #5: Using chant ID instead of melody ID for local storage name. There is always a chant ID for a melody, and the image is always the same for a chant ID.

Moved admin interface to genomel_editor/admin URL for multi-app deployment.

Updated Help to reflect that images now get cached in local storage.

Closes #1
Images that are pasted get saved into LocalStorage with the melody.id.
Changed default image.
Added a Help page.
Fixing static URL typo.

Adapted static file URLs for deployment under /genomel_editor/ app root URL.
Some styling.
Added chantlab as host.
Removed database file from repo.

Added header font.
Playing around with debugging MIME types in scripts and CSS files.
Changed app URL for multi-app deployment.
Added requirements.txt file.
Started some basic styling work. Small changes.
Rendering the volpiano and syllabized text in transcription now works.
Pasting an image now works. The container div can be resized as well.
Started adding panzoom functionality for images
Undid an accidental refactor in .gitignore comment
Configured static files for development. Added test image.
Added handling submitted annotations: states (in transcription, in checks, finalized) and state transition logic (in views.save_annotation()).
Added migrations related to prev. commit
Added annotation form. Stuck on when Melody objects should be created and how. Likely needs slots for Transcriber and Verifier roles, rather than just one User.
Added annotation template, admin dashboard template, appropriate redirects on login.
Improved CSV parsing with csv.reader
Added __pycache__ to ignored locations
Merge branch 'main' of github.com:Genome-of-Melody/genomel_editor
Skeleton app. Has user login/logout, superuser vs. annotator groups, chants CSV upload for admins (source CSV upload not working yet), nothing else.
Initial commit
